data.name: bussinessFirstTitle
data.value: Sad, but true Majority of your customer do not return after their initial visit

data.name: bussinessFirstFirstTitle
data.value: With Payxat, you can only expect exponential increase in sales

data.name: bussinessSecondTitle
data.value: Payxat offers global technology to local businesses

data.name: bussinessSecondDesc
data.value: We bring you the best in technology in order to run and manage your rewards program at the touch of the button. Establish firm relationship with your customers and delight them with tempting offers and promotion with our rewards program.

data.name: bussinessThirdTitle
data.value: Multiply your revenue with return customers

data.name: bussinessThirdDesc

data.name: bussinessFourthTitle

data.name: howitworksLandingTitle
data.value: Watch your business grow

data.name: howitworksLandingDesc
data.value: Get rewards program from Payxat for first-hand experience in the true power of a well-built loyalty eco-system.

data.name: howitworksSecondTitle
data.value: How Payxat works for your business?

data.name: howitworksSecondDesc
data.value: Our state-of-the-art all-in-one program is built to get more customers into your stores.

data.name: howitworksThirdTitle
data.value: Get to know your customers

data.name: howitworksThirdDesc
data.value: Rewards program by Payxat is not only easy to learn, master and use but it also helps you in connecting with your customers in a more personal level, including getting to know their names, gender, age groups, preferences and so on.

data.name: howitworksFourthTitle
data.value: Promotional campaign that are crafted to perfection

data.name: howitworksFourthDesc
data.value: We have incorporated in-app notification that pop-up just in-time for your customers to take notice of your special offers. Welcome new customers, celebrate anniversaries & birthdays, plus conduct a host of other activities with your valued customers.

data.name: howitworks8Title
data.value: Everyone loves promotions, hot deals and rewards

data.name: howitworks8Desc
data.value: Payxat is designed to help you bring more and more customers to your business and provides value for money in terms of return customers. Also, our application provides you with a detailed report on customer’s activity, redeems and new sign-up.

data.name: Manage rewards & promotions effortlessly
data.value: With our far-reaching rewards program that empowers your customers with additional spending power that showers them with benefits like gifts, rewards-points, trips, passes etc. with every purchase.

data.name: howitworks9Title
data.value: Amplify customer visits even with either one-time or seasonal promotions

data.name: howitworks9Desc
data.value: Make your promotions a one-time, regular or even seasonal affair with Payxat promotional tool. Also, you can make your promotional more meaningful by choosing and profiling your targeted customers.

data.name: howitworks10Title
data.value: Sign-in and also register with just your phone number

data.name: howitworks10Desc
data.value: Add new customers to your loyalty program in just a few seconds. New customers can sign-up at the store or from the comfort of their own phone. Our mobile app can handle the rush that you might have to otherwise encounter during the sign-up procedure at the store.

data.name: pricingLandingTitle
data.value: Attract new customers

data.name: pricingLandingDesc
data.value: Acquire new customers with Payxat

data.name: pricingSecondTitle
data.value: Meet your next best customer

data.name: pricingSecondDesc
data.value: Payxat sustains your business by generating new customers to promote healthy growth of your business. With little or no efforts, we help you in your quest for customer acquisition, just a few taps and we launch your business.

data.name: pricingFirstTitle
data.value: Flash your rewards

data.name: pricingThirdTitle
data.value: Push to their device

data.name: pricingThirdDesc
data.value: Customers that are in your neighbourhood can now view the details of your business that will be flashed on their screens and Payxat will provide you with genuine lead for customer acquisition when the customer shows interest in the rewards that was shown on his screen.

data.name: pricingFourthTitle
data.value: Locate by App and Website

data.name: pricingFourthDesc
data.value: Accessing Payxat by App or by Website will provide detailed info about the nearby businesses, including map and driving details, this is the Payxat way of making your business more visible to your potential customers and as an added benefit, we also broadcast about your business via SMS.

data.name: pricing8Title
data.value: Automate the process

data.name: pricing8Desc
data.value: Once the potential or even your regular customer is made aware about the rewards, Payxat program automatically engages them to accept the rewards and also attract them to your business, either as new or repeat customer.

data.name: pricing9Title
data.value: Let your customers speak for you

data.name: pricing9Desc
data.value: If any of your satisfied customer wants to spread a word or two about your business, Payxat ‘Word of Mouth’ option packs one of the most trusted and tested form of marketing – the recommendation of your happy customer to their family and friends. Acquire the true power of customer loyalty with Payxat.

data.name: pricing6Title
data.value: Match-making within your customer’s network

data.name: pricing10Title
data.value: Another feature that is aimed at acquiring new customers

data.name: pricing10Desc
data.value: With the addition of every 20 new customers to your Payxat rewards program within a span of 7-days will activate our specially built broadcast service that will be sent out to other potential customers of your neighbourhood that might have interested in your business. This is just one of the many features that we have in-store to help you acquire new customers and boost your business.

data.name: loyaltyretention8Title
data.value: Well-organized Loyalty program

data.name: loyaltyretention8Desc

data.name: lovelocalnetworkThirdDesc

data.value: Small businesses prefer to be on Payxat

data.name: englishSecondTitle

data.name: englishSecondDesc

We love to help our well-wishers with rewards and incentives and we are here to help your business scale new heights in terms of growth, revenue and customers base. Also, our quest to boost locally based business is what distinguishes Payxat from the rest, we are here to drive business into your neighbourhood stores with our robust application.

data.name: PrivacyFirstTitle
data.value: Privacy Policy

data.name: PrivacyThirdTitle
data.value: Information with Payxat

data.name: PrivacyThirdDesc
data.value: When you as an user interact (either by signing up with Payxat or by visiting the website or applications) with the website or the application or use or be part of the services that application or the platform provide (including merchant services), Payxat might collect and gather information from the user.

data.name: PrivacyFourthTitle
data.value: Information from users

data.name: PrivacyFourthDesc
data.value: User data might range from the information that the user voluntarily provides during the registration process, when the user fills the contact us form, takes part in surveys, contacts customer support etc and this data include date of birth, name, gender, phone number, email address, mailing address, phone number, location, device type, username including the information that is provided in surveys, questionnaires, emails, customer service requests etc. Information that you might exchange via merchants related to rewards might include data such as your purchase history, total amount that was spent, rewards earned / redeemed, purchase date, transaction details including credit card details. The data related to rewards are essential for smooth functioning of Payxat rewards programme. By agreeing to this privacy policy, you thereby acknowledge, authorise, approve and agree that Payxat not only collects and stores user data, but also transmits or transfer the data to centralised storage (data server) or data centre at one of the Payxat approved, secure and certified facility or premises.

data.name: Information extracted by Payxat Platform
data.value: Payxat as a website and application deploys cookies, log files, web beacons, tags and other forms of tracking technologies to automatically gather and collect some kind of user data including information that include total number of measures, user statistics and also information that are related to the user’s habits and preferences. User’s data is usually used by the Payxat platform for business intelligence, report generation and for usage by the operations team to provide optimum and enhanced user experience. Some part of the user data might be shared with certain third party application in order to provide the user with the required or desired output.

data.name: Privacy8Title
data.value: Information collected by cookies

data.name: Privacy8Desc
data.value: Cookies are used on the Payxat platform to provide convenience to the user, for example, enabling cookies might save time as the browser retains login credentials and form data. In case, if any of Payxat users do not wish to make use of this functionality, users are free to turn it off in their browser settings.

data.name: Privacy9Title
data.value: Information collected by third party services

data.name: Privacy9Desc
data.value: Apart from gathering user information via website, applications and device data, Payxat might also collect user data from third party services that is linked with the Payxat platform, including login credentials used in case, if the user choose to login to their account with social media accounts. In case of providing data to the third party services directly, like login-in by using social media accounts, third party might store your data in their system and the user data (of Payxat) is subjected to the privacy policies of the relevant third party and Payxat is not responsible and shall not have any kind of liability or accountability for the privacy and security practices of any third party service providers.

data.name: Privacy10Title
data.value: Information that are used

data.name: Privacy10Desc
data.value: All kind of data and information provided by the user and also extracted by the Payxat platform will be put to productive usage in accordance with privacy policies as mentioned in this document. Also, if any particular information shared by the user for some specific purpose, the information will be used only for the purpose that was intended. Also, Payxat might use certain information of its users to contact or reach them in order to inform them about the additional services or features that might be of interest to the Payxat users.

data.name: Privacy11Title
data.value: Information user can choose not to share

data.name: Privacy11Desc
data.value: Some information can be shared with third party for marketing or promotional purpose and this will be done with user consent and Payxat will also have the option to opt out of marketing or promotional campaign.

data.name: Privacy12Title
data.value: Information that are not covered

data.name: Privacy12Desc
data.value: Certain information such as general emails, postings, direct messages, product development ideas and suggestions, complaints and other kind of unsolicited information will be categorised as non-confidential and will not be subjected to the privacy policy of Payxat and Payxat in-turn is free to use, distribute, reproduce, disclose and advertise it without any kind of limitation and restrictions.

data.name: Privacy13Title
data.value: Underage information

data.name: Privacy13Desc
data.value: Payxat does not encourage children to register as user and in case, if it is detected that the database contains information that is submitted by children that are aged 13 and below, Payxat will immediately all the data of underage users.

data.name: Privacy14Title
data.value: Security of user information

data.name: Privacy14Desc
data.value: Payxat as a system, website, application and platform is designed to be safe, secure and user friendly with strict guidelines for data security. However, if any kind of data leak, data loss, data misuse, unauthorised usage and access to the system, external hacking or total destruction of the data takes place, Payxat is not liable or responsible for any kind of lapse in data security and user need to provide data and information to Payxat at the own free will and the data that they might provide might be subjected to all kind of attacks on the World Wide Web.

data.name: Privacy15Title
data.value: Privacy Policy might be subjected to changes

data.name: Privacy15Desc
data.value: Payxat is constantly evolving and refining from time to time and as per the need and requirement of merchant, user, third party and the general market conditions and thereby, the clauses in this privacy policy will have to be modified accordingly. Payxat reserves complete right and authority to revise, modify, alter or update this privacy policy from time to time, with or without prior notice. You as a user is advised to review this document periodically and you continued usage of Payxat service is your acceptance of our revised privacy policy agreement (if any).

data.name: Privacy16Title
data.value: Accessing user information

data.name: Privacy16Desc
data.value: You are free to contact us if you find your information on the Payxat platform incorrect and we will update it accordingly. Also, you can correct or modify information related to your account details by accessing your Payxat account.

data.name: pricing12ListDesc4
data.value: Payxat not only offers an easy option to share rewards, you can also choose rewards and promo that comes with an option of not to share. Our dashboard offers you to keep sharing on as default or in case, if you need to, to disable the sharing option from the rewards that are sent out.

data.name: pricing12ListDesc3
data.value: Payxat is just one step ahead in enabling your customers to share rewards that they receive on their devices. Sharing is just made easy and effortless with the express ‘Share’ button that comes with every new reward.

data.name: pricing12ListDesc2
data.value: All kind of offers and rewards that the customer receives via SMS will contain the link to the actual offer. Receiving link in the SMS will enable the recipient to share offers with family and friends by just forwarding that particular SMS.

data.name: pricing12ListDesc1
data.value: We encourage your customer to share the rewards that they receive, sharing to family and friends is another way of cementing loyalty and forging new relationships with your potential customers.

data.value: Subdivision:

data.name: loyaltyretention11ListDesc3
data.value: Subdivision means the ability to send special offers and promotion to your special group of customers, say for example, an offer aimed at welcoming only the first-time customers or the offer related to kids to the customers who have kids.

data.name: loyaltyretention11ListDesc2
data.value: Another feature that let you filter your customers based on parameters like age group, gender, spending habits, location etc. will further help you to send only tailor-made offers target at specific customers with matching profiles.

data.name: loyaltyretention11ListDesc1
data.value: Payxat enables to import customer details from excel, mailchimp, database or other kind of programs so that, you can save time and efforts and instead focus your complete attention to rewards and promotions.

data.name: loyaltyretention12Title
data.value: Simple way to redeem your rewards

data.name: loyaltyretention12ListHeader1
data.value: For your customers:

data.name: loyaltyretention12ListHeader2
data.value: For businesses:

data.name: loyaltyretention12ListDesc1
data.value: All your customer need to provide is the phone number in order to start earning reward points after the sign-in process and once they have enough points, they are free to redeem at their convenience.

data.name: loyaltyretention12ListDesc2
data.value: Manage and track your rewards points from your phone or laptop with Payxat application and also from your POS machine.

data.name: marketingautomation3Title
data.value: Grace the occasion with the right reward

data.name: marketingautomation3Desc
data.value: Advancing further up the ladder in the automation arena, Payxat’s armoury is equipped with business intelligence to generate rewards that are sent out to specific group at specific times and occasions. First-time customers require a different kind of reward than your regular customer and we are here to help you to convert your first-time customers to regulars.

data.name: marketingautomation3ListHeader1
data.value: Rewards during sign-up

data.name: marketingautomation3ListHeader2
data.value: Revisit incentive

data.name: marketingautomation3ListHeader3
data.value: Customer engagement

data.name: marketingautomation3ListHeader4
data.value: Lost customers

data.name: marketingautomation3ListHeader5
data.value: Drive more business

data.name: marketingautomation3ListHeader6
data.value: Lookout for more

data.name: marketingautomation3ListHeader7
data.value: Make them to return

data.name: marketingautomation3ListHeader8
data.value: Birthdays & Anniversaries

data.name: marketingautomation3ListDesc8
data.value: Be part of your customer’s birthday and anniversary celebration with tempting rewards to make their day even more special and blessed.

data.name: marketingautomation3ListDesc7
data.value: Special and dedicated rewards campaigns to compel your first-time customers to be regular and returning customers.

data.name: marketingautomation3ListDesc6
data.value: Customers that locate your business through Payxat App can also be targeted with rewards for their first visit to your store.

data.name: marketingautomation3ListDesc5
data.value: Targeting your regular customers will further increase sales and revenue. Payxat provides incentives and special offers to your repeat customers just to make them feel more special and welcome.

data.name: marketingautomation3ListDesc4
data.value: A majority of your customers might be just one-time visitors and Payxat even takes care of them by engaging with customers who are inactive between six months to one year.

data.name: marketingautomation3ListDesc3
data.value: Payxat rewards program engages with your customers who are not active in the business activities for a period of 30 days or more.

data.name: marketingautomation3ListDesc2
data.value: A majority of customers do not return after their first visit but some promise of offering extra rewards can make them coming once again.

data.name: marketingautomation3ListDesc1
data.value: Your first-time customers who sign-up for the rewards program will kick-start their loyalty-rewards journey with an incentive or bonus points.

data.name: english3Title
data.value: Payxat Benefits

data.name: english3ListHeader1
data.value: Promotional tool for your business

data.name: english3ListHeader2
data.value: Earn commission on referrals

data.name: english3ListHeader3
data.value: Track your earnings

data.name: english3ListHeader4
data.value: One-click support

data.name: english3ListDesc1
data.value: We offer assistance to businesses to boost their business by offering features that are designed to help your marketing team.

data.name: english3ListDesc2
data.value: Earn additional income by being our partner in our referral programme and earn every time you refer business to Payxat.

data.name: english3ListDesc3
data.value: You can track your referral earnings with just a few clicks.

data.name: english3ListDesc4
data.value: Check our videos, brochures and flyers for more information about our referral programme

data.name: legalSecondTitle
data.value: Terms of Service

data.name: legal11Title
data.value: The Service

data.name: legal11ListHeader1
data.value: Your registration details:

data.name: legal11ListHeader2
data.value: Account confidentiality:

data.name: legal11ListHeader3
data.value: Amendment to service:

data.name: legal11ListHeader4
data.value: Rewards:

data.name: legal11ListDesc1
data.value: To access most of the features of Payxat, it is recommended that you register with your details and once you choose to register, it will be assumed by us that you are providing your accurate, correct, complete and updated details about you during the registration process. All kind of data that you provide will be governed by our privacy policy agreement. You must be at least 13 years of age to register and use Payxat. Also you agree that, you will provide only your phone number during the registration process.

data.name: legal11ListDesc2
data.value: You as a registered user is solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and also all the activities that takes places under your account. You also agree to bring to our immediate notice, if you detect any kind of unauthorised usage of your account or the breach or lapse in security. It is advised to log-out of your account at the end of each session with Payxat and we are in no way responsible or liable for any kind of loss or damage that you might incur, either by failing to comply with the aforementioned security measure or by some means of external interference from undesired elements.

data.name: legal11ListDesc3
data.value: Payxat reserves the right to change, modify, alter or even discontinue either for some period of time or even permanently (partial or complete) with our without any notice. You agree that, Payxat (or any entities and third parties associated with the service) will not be held accountable, liable or responsible for suspension, alternation, modification or discontinuance of the service.

data.name: legal11ListDesc4
data.value: Payxat rewards that are part of the service are purely promotional in nature and these rewards are offered by merchants that are registered with Payxat and rewards are applicable to be redeemable in exchange for product or service with the corresponding merchant. In case, if the merchant fails to honour the reward, Payxat is not liable for any kind of compensation to the user. Also, the following points are applicable with respect to rewards on Payxat:

data.name: legal22ListHeader1
data.value: Rewards related to alcoholic beverages are subjected to the local laws

data.name: legal22ListHeader2
data.value: Rewards cannot be used to pay or barter for any other additional services, commodities or products unless permitted by the merchant.

data.name: legal22ListHeader3
data.value: Sale, transfer or gifting of reward is prohibited

data.name: legal22ListHeader4
data.value: Merchant is free to fix the redemption frequency

data.name: legal22ListHeader5
data.value: Any attempt made during redemption that does not comply with the policies of either merchant or Payxat will nullify the reward

data.name: legal22ListHeader6
data.value: Rewards cannot be combined or added with any other kind of rewards, promotions, discounts, coupons, gift cards etc. unless specified by the merchant

data.name: legal22ListHeader7
data.value: Reward redemption is limited to just one reward at a time and redemption of more than one reward at a time is at the sole discretion of the merchant.

data.name: legal22ListHeader8
data.value: Reward can be withdrawn or cancelled if it conflicts with the law

data.name: legal22ListHeader9
data.value: Payxat or merchant is not responsible if you are unable to redeem your rewards due to any kind of reason

data.name: legal11ListHeader5
data.value: Third-Party Services:

data.name: legal11ListDesc5
data.value: Payxat uses third party services like Facebook, Google or Twitter login and by opting to use for third party services for login, you are permitting Payxat to pass your account details to these services and the data and information that they store are governed by their security and privacy policies and Payxat shall have no any responsibility or liability for the way your information is being handled by the third parties. Also, the third party login is enabled to provide our customers with an addition option and it is not anyway related or connected with our endorsement of the third party and Payxat is not to be held responsible, liable or accountable if the third party decides to terminate your association with their services or shuts down its service. Services on mobile devices: Payxat services can be access via phone or tablet and this might include data charges. Also, by using your mobile device, you agree to receive SMS, push-notification and emails on your device and you are responsible for the security of the data that reside in the device. Also, in case you change your phone number, you need to update your Payxat account with the same.

data.name: legal12Title
data.value: Condition of use

data.name: legal12ListHeader1
data.value: User content:

data.name: legal12ListHeader2
data.value: Not for commercial gain:

data.name: legal12ListDesc1
data.value: All kind of data and information like pictures, graphics, content, video, audio and everything related to the application is to be liked and related to the user from which such content originated, thereby, user and not Payxat must be held accountable for any kind of gross, offensive, malicious, or detrimental content.

data.name: legal12ListDesc2
data.value: The service offered by Payxat through its application is only for your personal usage and it must not be used for commercial gains. Unless agreed by Payxat, you are prohibited from sharing, transmitting, copying, reproducing, publishing, modifying, selling of the content and information related to Payxat services.

data.name: legal13Title
data.value: Intellectual Property Rights

data.name: legal13ListHeader1
data.value: Content and trademarks:

data.name: legal13ListHeader2
data.value: Third part content:

data.name: legal13ListHeader3
data.value: User content & submissions:

data.name: legal13ListHeader4
data.value: Copyright information and removal of copyright materials:

data.name: legal13ListDesc1
data.value: All content, data and information is protected by the copyright law, patent and proprietary rights. By being part of Payxat, you agree to honour and respect intellectual property rights of Payxat and its merchants and you must not attempt to copy, transmit, modify, sell, resell, lease, distribute, loan as a part or as a whole the information, except the user content that you have uploaded on your own and which you agree that you possess complete rights to that content (user content). Also, you do not attempt to hack, copy, reverse engineer, data mine or run any kind of malicious code on the application in general. Payxat name and the logo is the trademark of Payxat and this includes the application, services, merchant’s logo and the intellectual property rights related to the merchants that are registered with Payxat and user is forbidden to use any trademarked material unless authorised by Payxat or the merchant(s) that are registered with Payxat.

data.name: legal13ListDesc2
data.value: Payxat is not responsible and are not liable under any circumstances for any sort of content that is being posted on its application by users, merchant or any other third party and any Payxat is immune to any kind of damage resulting through content, including rewards or any other services offered on the app. Also, Payxat does not screen or moderate content posted by user or merchant and Payxat possess the rights to refuse to remove content that the user might find offensive or otherwise.

data.name: legal13ListDesc3
data.value: You as a user is solely responsible for the content that you post (user content) on Payxat and you declare that you will not post any content that is not your own and you do not own any rights to it. And, by posting content, you hereby grant Payxat, its merchant, third parties associated with Payxat, our marketing, advertising and social media partners and any other entity associated with Payxat the complete rights and freedom to use, modify, transmit, store, distribute, promote, sell, sublicense the user content and Payxat is not required to compensate any user for their content. Also, at Payxat, any suggestions, ideas, comments, emails, questions, submissions or any kind of info that you provide to Payxat via email, app, phone or any other medium will be considered as user content and the above mentioned rules are applicable to this form of content as well.

data.name: legal33ListHeader1
data.value: By mail:

data.name: legal33ListDesc1
data.value: Write your address

data.name: legal33ListHeader2
data.value: By email:

data.value: By phone:

data.value: Write your phone

data.name: legalThirdTitle
data.value: Application providers and Third party links

data.name: legalFourthTitle
data.value: External links and third party websites

data.name: legalFourthDesc
data.value: Payxat service might include links or accessing of external websites that might also include details about rewards offered by merchants. Payxat is no way connected or associated with any kind of external links that arise out from Payxat application and you as a user is solely responsible for any kind of damages that you might incur by visiting or accessing all kind of external links and Payxat is shall not be held liable or responsible, either directly or indirectly.

data.name: legal8Title
data.value: Indemnity and Release

data.name: legal8Desc
data.value: You agree to release, indemnify and hold Payxat and its merchants, associates, affiliates, directors, promotes, employees any anyone connected or linked with Payxat harmless from and against any and all losses, lawsuits, threats, damages, propaganda, media campaigns, expenses including legal charges of any kind of harm, injury, damage, loss (including death) arising out of services or content.

data.name: legal9Title
data.value: Disclaimer

data.name: legal9Desc
data.value: Your usage of Payxat services is at your own risk and the services offered is provided by merchants registered with the application as ‘Merchant’ or Service Provider and Payxat is not to be connected, associated or linked with the services that is being offered by the merchants and renounce any kind of accountability that might incur with your usage or interaction of the Payxat application as a whole. Furthermore, Payxat does not guarantee that the services offered will meet your requirements or fulfil your needs and expectations or the services will be free of any error, interruption or disruption. Also, we do not guarantee that the services and content on Payxat is accurate, reliable, trustworthy or even superior in quality & value.

data.name: legal4Title
data.value: Limitation of liability

data.name: legal4Desc
data.value: If you are not satisfied with any portion of Payxat service or with these terms of service, the only solution for you is to just STOP using this service of ours. You agree to the fact that, we are in no way liable or to be held responsible for any kind of damages, losses or inconvenience of any kind that might be cause by your usage of our service, the inability to use our service, limitations and restrictions placed on our service, your misunderstanding about the usage of our service or even by unauthorised usage of our service.

data.name: legal6Title
data.value: Termination & Suspension

data.name: legal6Desc
data.value: Payxat might suspend, terminate, limit your access or enforce restrictions on your account for use of service for any or no reason, with or without prior notice or warning. Your access to the Payxat services might also be suspended or terminated if you violate any of the clauses of this term of service agreement and your account will also be subjected to termination or suspension if Payxat finds you to be abusive, deceptive, fraudulent or possess criminal or illegal intent, moreover, any kind of violation with legal consequences will result you being referred to the appropriate law enforcement agencies. Deactivation of your account for these aforementioned reasons or cause will void all your rewards and your agreement with merchants that you are associated with. You also agree that, Payxat will not be liable or responsible for any kind of damages that you might incur due to the suspension or termination of your account.

data.name: legal16Title
data.value: Disputes

data.name: legal16Desc
data.value: In case of dispute between you and Merchant, Payxat will not bear any kind or responsibility or legal cost resulting from the dispute. Also, if this dispute is the result of the violation or breach of the agreement between Payxat and user, Payxat reserves the right to terminate user account as mentioned in the ‘Termination & Suspension’ clause (see above). Any dispute arising out by the usage of Payxat services will be governed by the laws of the State of Kuwait.

data.name: legal17Title
data.value: Information and verification by SMS services

data.name: legal17Desc
data.value: To safeguard user’s privacy, Payxat enforces SMS authentication to verify user’s identity before granting them access to most of the Payxat services, although, certain sections of the application can be browsed without registering or verifying your account details. Registration with Payxat means, your wiliness to receive SMS alerts from Payxat the registered merchants at Payxat.

data.name: legal18Title
data.value: Additional Terms of Services & Privacy Policies

data.name: legal18Desc
data.value: Apart from the above mentioned terms of services, you will be subjected to Privacy Policy (check our Privacy Policy section for more details) and also to additional terms of services that may apply when you use affiliate services, third-party content, merchant related policies or third-party applications (including external links).

data.name: privacy20Title
data.value: Information that are used

data.name: privacy20Desc
data.value: All kind of data and information provided by the user and also extracted by the Payxat platform will be put to productive usage in accordance with privacy policies as mentioned in this document. Also, if any particular information shared by the user for some specific purpose, the information will be used only for the purpose that was intended. Also, Payxat might use certain information of its users to contact or reach them in order to inform them about the additional services or features that might be of interest to the Payxat users.

data.name: privacy20ListHeader1
data.value: Merchant those are registered with Payxat:

data.name: privacy20ListHeader2
data.value: Business to business:

data.name: privacy20ListHeader3
data.value: Payxat entities:

data.name: privacy20ListHeader4
data.value: Employees and associated of Payxat:

data.name: privacy20ListHeader5
data.value: Your public profile data that you choose to make public:

data.name: privacy20ListHeader6
data.value: Information provided to law enforcement:

data.name: privacy20ListDesc1
data.value: Payxat provides user data to merchant in order to send rewards, validate rewards, to provide information regarding redemptions, offers and for other things that are required in order to provide effective merchant service to Payxat users.

data.name: privacy20ListDesc3
data.value: Data might be shared with other Payxat entity that has interest in running and functioning of the Payxat service and this kind of information sharing will be in accordance with the Payxat privacy policy.

data.name: privacy20ListDesc4
data.value: Certain information will be shared with employees in order to facilitate them with carrying out specific tasks and assignments like tracking rewards, sending emails, managing and maintain database, enforcing data security etc.

data.name: privacy20ListDesc5
data.value: Some part of the data such as First and Second Name, Profile Picture, Gender and Location are made public by default and can be viewed by other user (that are registered with Payxat). However, related information such as age, phone, email and birthday can be either made public (by the respective user) or can be hidden (private).

data.name: privacy20ListDesc6
data.value: In case, if this is required, Payxat will be forced to share user data with law enforcement.

data.name: lovelocalnetworkFirstDesc
data.value: Most of the small-scale businesses in and around residential & commercial layouts are frequented by locals that live and work nearby and keeping this trend in mind, Payxat is pleased to introduce the concept of LocalBusiness Network for our users to connect more closely with businesses in their neighbourhood.

data.name: Privacy5Title
data.value: Information extracted by Payxat Platform

data.name: Privacy5Desc
data.value: Payxat as a website and application deploys cookies, log files, web beacons, tags and other forms of tracking technologies to automatically gather and collect some kind of user data including information that include total number of measures, user statistics and also information that are related to the user’s habits and preferences. User’s data is usually used by the Payxat platform for business intelligence, report generation and for usage by the operations team to provide optimum and enhanced user experience. Some part of the user data might be shared with certain third party application in order to provide the user with the required or desired output.

data.name: privacy20ListDesc2
data.value: In case, at some point of time, if Payxat is being merged or is taken over by some other business entity, user data will be handed over to the new owners in accordance with the Payxat privacy policy.

data.name: PromotionLandingTitle
data.value: Promote your business

data.name: PromotionLandingDesc
data.value: Offers, rewards, gifts, promotions, incentives and more...

data.name: PromotionFourthTitle
data.value: More walk-in customers

data.name: PromotionFourthDesc
data.value: Want to celebrate occasions and festivals with special offers or perhaps you want to reward your customers with some additional surprise? Payxat has all the tools at your disposal with option to automate promotional campaign, send your offers in seconds.

data.name: PromotionFourthListHeader1
data.value: We assist

data.name: PromotionFourthListHeader2
data.value: Schedule your rewards

data.name: PromotionFourthListHeader3
data.value: Choose the medium

data.name: PromotionFourthListHeader4
data.value: In your hands

data.name: PromotionFourthListDesc4
data.value: Payxat works just fine with your phone or tablet and no matter where you are, you can send rewards at a moment’s notice.

data.name: PromotionFourthListDesc3
data.value: Send your offers and rewards by in-app push notification, email or text and rest assured, we will deliver it that way you want it to be.

data.name: PromotionFourthListDesc2
data.value: Schedule your promotions in order to send it at the right hour.

data.name: PromotionFourthListDesc1
data.value: If you are short of time, need to meet deadline or busy in your business activities, our autofill and autocorrect features will enable you to publish your rewards in a jiffy.

data.name: Promotion5Title
data.value: Informative dashboard

data.name: Promotion6Title
data.value: Target your customers

data.name: Promotion7Title
data.value: Grow with Payxat

data.name: Promotion7Desc
data.value: With features and tools that can help your business to generate more sales, Payxat is the number one choice for business that is looking forward to boost their volume & sales.

data.name: Promotion6Desc
data.value: We know that, when it comes to marketing, targeted promotions is the way to go for your business and we are here to make this just right for you. Customise your targeted audience with Payxat , create categories based on customer preferences or classify targeted audiences based on promotion type and occasion. Sending rewards to the a few selected groups is bound to create more foot-traffic to your store.

data.name: Promotion5Desc
data.value: Payxat rely on the data and information that is being constantly fed into its system by businesses spread across multiple locales and territories. This organised, updated and systematic data provides detailed information in the dashboard section of the application for businesses to make discussion and also to monitor the performance of their campaigns.

data.name: masterlinkNamePrivacy

data.name: legalThirdDesc
data.value: Payxat will be made available via website www.Payxat.com and also through Google Play Store and Apple App Store (providers) and you agree to abide by the rules of the usage of the Payxat application as set forth by these providers and your license to the usage of this application can be blocked or revoked by the provider without any kind of prior notice. Also, provider is not obliged to provide maintenance or technical support with respect to the Payxat application. In the event of any dispute arising from intellectual property right, Payxat and not the provider is responsible for any kind of property infringement violation.

data.name: PrivacySecondDesc
data.value: This privacy policy of Payxat is all about the way we collect, use, gather, share, store, protect, safeguard, secure the information and data of our users and also of the visitors who visit and use www.payxat.com and iOS and Android applications of Payxat. By using the Payxat services (such as visiting website, registration as user, interacting with merchants, receiving and redeeming of rewards etc.) you agree to our Terms of Service and also all the clauses (described below) of this Privacy Policy. In case, you choose not to agree with our policies (Terms of Service and Privacy Policy), either in full or in part, may choose not to use Payxat services. Apart from this Privacy Policy, you will be subjected to Terms of Service (check our Terms of Service section for more details) and also to additional terms of services (including their respective Privacy Policy) that may apply when you use affiliate services, third-party content, merchant related policies or third-party applications (including external links).

data.name: legal13ListDesc4
data.value: In case, you notice any of our users or merchant has posted any content that violates copyright law, then you are free to contact us and we will remove the copyright material from Payxat. You can contact us here

data.name: imgbusiness
data.value: /Images/acd64d4b-ebe8-4885-ace2-2034449c444f.jpg

data.name: legalSecondDesc
data.value: Payxat is an application that provides its users with the option to earn loyalty or rewards points from the registered merchants its offerings (or services) of website www.payxat.com , mobile application and through the program that can be made to run through various devices, including tablets, laptops, POS machines etc. Payxat services are subjected to the following terms and conditions (which will be amended periodically) along with the privacy policy www.payxat.com/privacy , Payxat possess the rights to change, add, delete or modify any part of this terms of service agreement without any prior notice and your usage of our services is a testimony to your acceptance of the revised terms and in case, if you do not agree with our terms, you are free to stop using our services.
